participant_1.background:
My family are avid cyclists as well
I'm a farmer who likes to pickle eggs and horseback ride in my spare time.
I'm not sure of my current weight, but I'm working on it.
I enjoy long drives in the countryside and sometimes I spot my neighbour's pool boy.
I ride my bicycle every day to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus on my writing.

participant_2.background:
I do not have kids because I enjoy my quiet life with my cat.
i like to wear black.
I am proud of my passion for swimming and how it has helped me to stay healthy and active.
I am a baker trying to find my way in life.
i have a brown belt in karate.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing this morning?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How are you doing?
I'm doing well too, thank you! I'm excited to be chatting with you today.
Me too! I'm always looking for new friends.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a baker, trying to find my way in life.
Oh, that's awesome! I love baking. What kind of things do you like to bake?
I like to bake all sorts of things, but my favorite is probably chocolate chip cookies.
Chocolate chip cookies are my favorite too! I love how easy they are to make and how delicious they are.
Me too! They're so simple and yet so delicious.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to swim, I have a brown belt in karate, and I like to read.
Wow, you're quite the athlete! I love to swim too. It's so relaxing and a great way to stay in shape.
It is! I love the feeling of being in the water and the freedom of movement.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
I agree! It's been a pleasure chatting with you.
It's been nice chatting with you too! Have a great day!
